Question:
Iyi tank iri mu bwoko bwa triangular prism. Niba imfuruka eshatu ifite ubuso bwa metero kare 116, kandi tank ifite metero 30 z'uburebure, amazi yari kuba afite angahe iyo yuzuye?
A.1725 Bye Bye Ft^3
B.1740 Bye Bye Ft^3
C.3480 Bye Bye Ft^3
D.6960 Bye Bye Ft^3
GivenAnswer:
Ngo tubone igisubizo, tugomba gukoresha iyi formule y'igihumbi cy'imfuruka eshatu:

Volume = (1/2) × Base area × Height

Dufite ibi bikurikira:
- Ubuso bw'imfuruka = 116 m^2
- Uburebure bwa tank = 30 m

Noneho, dushyire ibi mu iyi formule:

Volume = (1/2) × 116 m^2 × 30 m
            = 58 m^2 × 30 m
            = 1740 m^3

Noneho, 1 m^3 = 35.3147 ft^3

Bityo, 1740 m^3 = 1740 × 35.3147 ft^3 = 61447.58 ft^3 ≈ 61448 ft^3

Mu bisubizo byatanzwe, igisubizo kiri hafi ya 1740 m^3 ni B. 1740 ft^3.

Noneho igisubizo ni B. 1740 ft^3.

Question:
Menya igipimo cya H+(aq) kiri muri 1.0 M phenol, C6H5OH. (1 × 10.)
A.1 × 10-10 M
B.1 × 10-9 M
C.1 × 10-3 M
D.1 × 10-5 M
GivenAnswer:
Reka dusuzume ikibazo maze dusubize ibibazo byose neza.

Phenol (C6H5OH) ni asidi ifite Ka = 1.0 × 10-10.

Mu gihe [C6H5OH] = 1.0 M, dushobora gukoresha equilibrium ya ionization ya phenol kugira ngo dusange [H+]:

C6H5OH + H2O <=> C6H5O- + H+
Ka = ([C6H5O-][H+])/[C6H5OH]

Kubera ko asidi ari nkeya cyane, dushobora kwemeza ko [C6H5OH] ingana na 1.0 M kandi [C6H5O-] = [H+].

Noneho, Ka = ([H+]^2)/[C6H5OH] = ([H+]^2)/1.0
1.0 × 10-10 = [H+]^2
[H+] = sqrt(1.0 × 10-10) = 1.0 × 10-5 M

Noneho, igisubizo ni D. 1 × 10-5 M.

Mu mabwiriza y'umutekano wa acetone harimo ijambo rivuga ko ari ijisho n'uruhu rudashobora guhumeka kandi rufite umwuka ushobora gutwika. Ni ibihe bintu by'umutekano abanyeshuri bagomba kwirinda mu gihe cyo gukora imyitozo ngororamubiri?
A.Ahabanza Amakuru Amakuru y'Imyidagaduro Umuyobozi w'Akarere ka Nyabihu yavuze ko umuyobozi
B.Gushyira icyumba cy'icyumba cy'
C.Kwambara imyenda y'ibara ry
D.Kwambara inkweto n'inkweto zo mu bwoko bwa nitrile no gufunga kontineri zose za acetone
GivenAnswer:
Igisubizo nyacyo ni D. Kwambara inkweto n'inkweto zo mu bwoko bwa nitrile no gufunga kontineri zose za acetone.

Mu mabwiriza y'umutekano wa acetone havuzwe ko ari ijisho n'uruhu rudashobora guhumeka kandi rufite umwuka ushobora gutwika. Bityo, abanyeshuri bagomba kwirinda ko acetone igera ku maso cyangwa uruhu, kandi bagomba kwirinda ikintu cyose gishobora gutuma acetone iba umuriro.

Inkweto n'inkweto zo mu bwoko bwa nitrile bizarinda uruhu rw'abanyeshuri guhumeka acetone. Gufunga neza kontineri zose za acetone bizabafasha kwirinda ko acetone iseseka hanze, bityo bikabafasha kwirinda inkongi y'umuriro n'ibindi byago bishobora guterwa na acetone.

Ibindi bisubizo ntabwo byuzuye cyane:

A. Amakuru y'imyidagaduro ntaho ahuriye n'umutekano mu gukoresha acetone.

B. Gushyira icyumba cy'icyumba cy'umwuka ntabwo ari ngombwa mu gukoresha acetone mu bunini buto.

C. Kwambara imyenda y'ibara ntabwo bizarinda abanyeshuri neza nk'uko inkweto n'inkweto bya nitrile bizabikora.

Question:
Kutanyurwa n'ubumuntu ni bumwe mu buryo bw'umwihariko
A.Kugwa mu mpanuka
B.Bye bye false dilemma
C.Gusaba ikibazo
D.Bye Bye Circular Reasoning
GivenAnswer:
Igisubizo ni C. Gusaba ikibazo.

"Kutanyurwa n'ubumuntu" ni uburyo bwo gusaba ikibazo (Appeal to Pity) mu nyito y'amakosa mu bwenge (logical fallacies). Ibi bivuze ko umuntu ashaka ko abandi bemere ibyo avuga kubera ko yumva atanyuzwe cyangwa agaragaza ko hari icyo abuze, aho kugaragaza ibimenyetso bifatika byerekana ukuri kw'ibyo avuga.

Izindi nzira zatanzwe:

A. Kugwa mu mpanuka: Ibi ntibihuje n'ikibazo cy'amakosa mu bwenge.

B. False dilemma: Iki ni ikindi gisobanuro cy'amakosa mu bwenge, ariko si cyo gisobanuro nyacyo cya "kutanyurwa n'ubumuntu". False dilemma ni iyo umuntu ateganya ibisubizo bibiri gusa kandi hakaba hari ibindi bisubizo bishoboka.

D. Circular Reasoning: Iki na cyo ni ikindi gisobanuro cy'amakosa mu bwenge, ariko si cyo gisobanuro nyacyo cya "kutanyurwa n'ubumuntu". Circular reasoning ni iyo umuntu asubiramo ibyo yavuze nk'ikimenyetso cyo gushimangira ibyo yakomeje kuvuga.

GivenAnswer:

Silent mutations ni impinduka zibera mu rukurikirane rwa nucleotide rwa jenomu ariko ntizihindura inshinga ya amino muri poroteyine itunganywa na jenomu iyo. Ibi bivuze ko poroteyine iguma isa n'uko yari mbere y'izo mpinduka kandi ikora neza.

Mu gihe silent mutations zidahindura imiterere n'imikorere ya poroteyine, zishobora gutuma isano y'ubwihindurize bw'ubwoko butandukanye bushingiye kuri poroteyine itandukanye n'ibishingiye ku rukurikirane rwa nucleotide rwa jenomu. Ibi ni ukubera ko silent mutations zishobora kugaragara nk'itandukaniro mu rukurikirane rwa nucleotide hagati y'ubwoko ariko ntizigaragare nk'itandukaniro mu nshinga za amino za poroteyine zihuje.

Ibindi bisubizo ntabwo byumvikana:
- Gene duplication ntabwo ituma habaho itandukaniro hagati y'isano ishingiye kuri poroteyine n'ishingiye kuri jenomu.
- Pseudogenes ntizigira uruhare muri iki kibazo.
- Intron splicing ntabwo ari ikintu nyacyo, kandi nayo ntiyagira ingaruka kuri iki kibazo.

Question:

Nyuma y'ibyo, intumwa y'Imana muhamadi (Imana imuhe amahoro n'imigisha) "Umuntu wese ushyiraho ivugurura ribi mu itegeko ryacu agomba kwirukanwa" kandi "umuntu wese ufite ubushobozi bwo kurwanya itegeko ryacu agomba kwirukanwa," ibikorwa byabaye ngombwa kandi bishimishije."
Ibaruwa yanditswe na Sultan Selim I yandikiye Safavid Shah Ismail I, 1514

D.Ismail yatangaje ko ari umukinnyi w'ikipe y'igihugu
GivenAnswer:

Question:
Sobanukirwa uburebure bw'uburebure bw'inyuguti y = ln x iri hagati y'ibice by'ahantu = 1/2 na y = 1.
A.0.53
B.0.86
C.1.18
D.1.36
GivenAnswer:
Reka dutangire twandike uburebure bw'inyuguti y = ln x hagati ya y = 1/2 na y = 1:

∫(1/2 kugeza 1) ln x dx

Twifashishije uburyo bwo guhindura intego, dushobora kwandika:

∫(1/2 kugeza 1) ln x dx = [x ln x - x](1/2 kugeza 1)

Ubu, dusimbuze imipaka:

[x ln x - x](1/2 kugeza 1) = (1 * ln 1 - 1) - (1/2 * ln (1/2) - 1/2)

Dukoresha ln 1 = 0 na ln (1/2) = -ln 2:

(1 * ln 1 - 1) - (1/2 * ln (1/2) - 1/2) = (0 - 1) - (1/2 * (-ln 2) - 1/2)
                                       = -1 - (1/2 * (-ln 2) - 1/2)
                                       = -1 + 1/2 ln 2 + 1/2
                                       = 1/2 ln 2 - 1/2

Noneho, dusimbuze ln 2 ≈ 0.693:

1/2 ln 2 - 1/2 ≈ 1/2 * 0.693 - 1/2
               ≈ 0.3465 - 0.5
               ≈ -0.1535

Mu bisubizo byatanzwe, igisubizo kiri hafi ya -0.1535 ni 0.53. Bityo igisubizo ni A. 0.53.

Question:
Kuba umubare wa infrared absorption frequency ya hydrouterium chloride (DCl) wakuwe muri hydrogen chloride (HCl) biterwa n'itandukaniro ryayo.
A.Ahabanza Amakuru Amakuru y'Imyidagaduro Amakuru y'
B.Bye bye dipole moment
C.Imbaraga zihoraho
D.Mitigate massage
GivenAnswer:
Igisubizo ni B. Bye bye dipole moment.

Ibisobanuro:

Infrared absorption frequency ya hydrouterium chloride (DCl) itandukanye n'iya hydrogen chloride (HCl) bitewe n'itandukaniro rya dipole moment yayo.

- Dipole moment ni ingano yerekana uburyo molecule igabanyijemo ibice bibiri bifite umubare utandukanye w'electrons, bityo ikagira ubutarumikwa butandukanye.

- Mu HCl, hydrogen ifite electronegativity nkeya kurusha chlorine, bityo electrons baraterwa kuri chlorine bituma habaho dipole moment.

- Ariko muri DCl, deuterium ni isotope ya hydrogen ifite mass nini kurusha hydrogen, bityo ituma dipole moment ya DCl iba nto kurusha iya HCl.

- Iri tandukaniro rya dipole moment hagati ya HCl na DCl niyo mpamvu infrared absorption frequencies zabo zitandukanye.

Noneho ibisubizo bisigaye ntibisobanura neza impamvu habaho itandukaniro hagati ya HCl na DCl:

- Amakuru y'imyidagaduro ntaho ahuriye n'iyi mpamvu 
- Imbaraga zihoraho ntizigira uruhare mu itandukaniro rya dipole moment
- "Mitigate massage" nta sano bifitanye n'ikibazo.

Question:
Ni nde mu bihugu bikurikira ohereza co2 ku muturage muri 2017?
A.Ubuyapani
B.Canada
C.Uburusiya
D.Irani
GivenAnswer:
Mu bihugu bivuzwe, igihugu cyohereje CO2 ku muturage mwinshi mu 2017 ni Canada.

Canada ifite ubukungu bukomeye kandi buteye imbere, aho abantu benshi bakoresha imodoka n'ibindi bikoresho bihumanya ikirere. Ni kimwe mu bihugu bikoresha ingufu nyinshi z'ibicanwa nk'amashanyarazi, gaze n'amavuta.

Nubwo Ubuyapani n'Uburusiya na byo ari ibihugu bikomeye mu bukungu, ariko buri kimwe gifite umubare munini w'abaturage bituma CO2 yoherezwa ku muturage iba nkeya ugereranije na Canada.

Irani nayo ntabwo iri ku rwego rwo hejuru mu iterambere nk'ibindi bihugu bivuzwe, bituma na yo CO2 yoherezwa ku muturage iba nkeya.

Muri rusange, ibihugu byateye imbere mu bukungu ni byo byohereza CO2 nyinshi ku kirere bitewe n'ikoreshwa ryinshi ry'ingufu zikomoka ku bicanwa n'ibindi bikoresho bihumanya ikirere.

Question:

D.Imisoro y'ishoramari.
GivenAnswer:
Igisubizo ni C. Ibicuruzwa byo mu bwoko bw'ibicuruzwa.

Ibisobanuro:

1. Gukoresha neza umutungo kamere mu buryo bwihuse ntibigira ingaruka nziza ku bukungu mu gihe kirekire. Ahubwo, bishobora gutera ingaruka mbi nko gukena no kunanirwa kubona ibikoresho kamere mu gihe kizaza.

2. Umubare munini w'abantu bakuru batazi gusoma no kwandika ntushobora guteza imbere ubukungu ahubwo ushobora kubuhindura kuko abantu badafite ubumenyi buhagije kugira ngo batange umusaruro mwiza.

3. Ibicuruzwa byo mu bwoko bw'ibicuruzwa ni byo bishobora gutuma ubukungu bwiyongera cyane uko iminsi igenda ishira. Ibi bicuruzwa birimo ikoranabuhanga, ubumenyi, n'ibindi. Ibi bicuruzwa bishobora kugurwa no kugurisha ku gaciro kari hejuru, bityo bigateza imbere ubukungu.

4. Imisoro y'ishoramari ntabwo ari ingirakamaro mu iterambere ry'ubukungu ahubwo ishobora gukumira abashoramari.

Muri rusange, ibicuruzwa byo mu bwoko bw'ibicuruzwa ni byo bishobora gutuma ubukungu bwiyongera cyane uko iminsi igenda ishira.

Question:

Question:

Globalization itandukanye n'izindi nteruro zikurikira:

B. Ubukungu bw'isi: Ubu ni uburyo ibihugu byose bihuriyeho mu bukungu ariko si ngombwa ko ari ibihangange gusa biyobora.

Question:

GivenAnswer:

Abahanga b'ubwihindurize nka Skinner bavugaga ko imyitwarire ari ikintu gishobora kwigwa no gusobanurwa hakoreshejwe amategeko rusange, bityo bakaba bashaka gushakisha uko abantu n'inyamaswa bigana imyitwarire mishya binyuze mu guhemba no guhana imyitwarire runaka.

Question:
Kugenda ku muvuduko wa mbere wa 1.5 × 10-6 m/s, proton yinjira mu karere ka magnetique ihoraho ya magnitude 1.5 T. Niba vector ya mbere y'umuvuduko wa proton ikora imfuruka ya 30° hamwe n'ikibuga cya magnetique, kubara umuvuduko wa proton 4 nyuma yo kwinjira mu kibuga cya magnetique.
A.5.0 × 10 6 m/s
B.7.5 × 10-6 m/s
C.1.5 × 10-6 m/s
D.3.0 × 10-6 m/s
GivenAnswer:
Ikibazo gikeneye ko dukoresha amategeko y'imikorere ya magnetique kugira ngo tubone igisubizo nyacyo. Reka dutangirire dushakishe ibisubizo.

Tuzi ibi bikurikira:
- Umuvuduko wa mbere wa proton (v₀) = 1.5 × 10⁻⁶ m/s
- Uburemere bwa magnetique (B) = 1.5 T
- Imfuruka hagati y'umuvuduko wa mbere n'ikibuga cya magnetique (θ) = 30°

Dukoresha amategeko y'imikorere ya Lorentz kugira ngo dusesengure ikibazo:
F = qv × B

Aho:
- F ari imbaraga ya Lorentz
- q ari umubare w'amashanyarazi ya proton
- v ari umuvuduko wa proton
- B ari uburemere bwa magnetique

Kubera ko proton igendagenda mu nzira y'uruziga mu kibuga cya magnetique, imbaraga ya Lorentz igomba kugira agaciro kangana n'imbaraga yo hagati:
F = mv²/r

Aho:
- m ari uburemere bwa proton
- v ari umuvuduko wa proton
- r ari akarambararo k'inzira y'uruziga

Tangira ushyira hamwe amategeko abiri:
qvB sin(θ) = mv²/r

Aho θ ari imfuruka hagati y'umuvuduko wa proton n'ikibuga cya magnetique.

Dushobora gukuramo r:
r = mv/(qB sin(θ))

Noneho, umuvuduko wa proton ntuzahinduka kubera ko nta mbaraga zo hanze zikora kuri yo. Bityo, v = v₀ = 1.5 × 10⁻⁶ m/s.

Noneho, dushyira agaciro ka v₀, B, na θ mu mategeko:
r = (1.67 × 10⁻²⁷ kg)(1.5 × 10⁻⁶ m/s)/((1.6 × 10⁻¹⁹ C)(1.5 T) sin(30°))

Tubarura r:
r = 2.08 × 10⁻⁶ m

Kubera ko umuvuduko wa proton utagenze, igisubizo nyacyo ni C. 1.5 × 10⁻⁶ m/s.

Question:

Question:
Ubu bubasha bufite amategeko akurikirana: "Umuntu ntabwo ari we ushinzwe imyitwarire y'ibyaha mu gihe cy'imyitwarire nk'iyo, bitewe n'uburwayi bwo mu mutwe cyangwa ubumuga bwo mu mutwe, nta bushobozi bwinshi bwo gushimira imyitwarire mibi y'imyitwarire ye, cyangwa guhuza imyitwarire ye n'ibisabwa n'amategeko." Umunsi umwe ku manywa y'ihangu, umushinjacyaha yari abyaye murumuna we w'imyaka itanu. Ubwo bari bakinaga hanze, umushinjacyaha yajugunye umupira hejuru y'umutwe w'umubyara we, maze ajya mu muhanda. Mu buryo bw'umwuka, murumuna we yiruka inyuma y'umupira ariko akubita hejuru y'ikibuga maze agwa mu muhanda. Ubwo yari afite umubyibuho ukabije, uyu mubyara we yari afite umubyibuho ukabije kandi ntiyashoboraga guhaguruka. Nyuma y'iminota mike, imodoka nini y'imyanda yari iri inyuma maze yiruka hejuru y'umubyara, iramwica. N'ubwo uyu mugabo yabonye ikibazo cy'umubyara we, ntiyigeze akora ibishoboka byose kugira ngo amufashe. Nyuma y'aho, umushinjacyaha yashinjwaga icyaha cyo kwica umuntu ku bushake. Mu rubanza, umushinjacyaha yatangaje ko yatunguwe cyane n'uko yabonye murumuna we agwa hafi y'imodoka y'imyanda ku buryo adashobora kwimuka kugeza igihe cyatinze. Nyuma y'ubuhamya bw'uregwa, umutangabuhamya w'impuguke yatanze ubuhamya bw'ababuranyi ko ibisubizo by'ubwoko bwavuzwe n'uregwa atari ibintu bidasanzwe iyo habayeho ibintu biteye ubwoba. None se niba urukiko rwemeje ubuhamya bw'uregwa n'umutangabuhamya we, umushinjacyaha mwiza kurusha abandi ni nde muri ibi bikurikira?
A.Umushinjacyaha yari afite ubusazi bw'igihe gito.
B.Ubushinjacyaha buvuga ko nta kibazo cy'ubushobozi bwo mu mutwe bukenewe muri Komisiyo y'Igihugu y'Ubugenzacyaha.
C.Kuba umushinjacyaha yananiwe gukora ntabwo byari ku bushake.
D.Ubushinjacyaha buvuga ko icyaha cy'ubugizi bwa nabi cyatewe n'umushoferi w'imodoka.
GivenAnswer:
Igisubizo nyacyo ni C. Kuba umushinjacyaha yananiwe gukora ntabwo byari ku bushake.

Hashingiwe ku mategeko yatanzwe, umuntu ntabwo ari we ushinzwe imyitwarire y'ibyaha iyo, bitewe n'uburwayi bwo mu mutwe cyangwa ubumuga bwo mu mutwe, nta bushobozi bwinshi bwo gushimira imyitwarire mibi y'imyitwarire ye, cyangwa guhuza imyitwarire ye n'ibisabwa n'amategeko.

Muri iki gihe, umushinjacyaha yatunguwe cyane n'uko yabonye murumuna we agwa hafi y'imodoka y'imyanda ku buryo adashobora kwimuka. Ubuhamya bw'impuguke bwemeje ko ibisubizo nk'ibyo atari ibintu bidasanzwe iyo habayeho ibintu biteye ubwoba.

Bityo, kuba umushinjacyaha yananiwe gukora ntabwo byari ku bushake, ahubwo byatewe n'uburwayi bwo mu mutwe bw'igihe gito bitewe n'ibintu biteye ubwoba yabonye. Ntabwo yari afite ubushobozi buhagije bwo gushimira imyitwarire ye muri icyo gihe.

Question:
Ni ikihe kintu muri ibi bikurikira kigaragaza ko umubyibuho ukabije ari ukuri?

B.Bye bye nadp+
C.Muri Glycolysis, glucose yashyizwe mu bicuruzwa bitatu bya carbon
D.Insoro z'insoro zitukura mu maraso ni pyruvate
GivenAnswer:
Igisubizo nyacyo ni A: Ahabanza Amakuru Amakuru y'Imyidagaduro Igipimo cya Glycolysis cyiyongereye.

Iyo umubyibuho ukabije, umubiri ukenera ingufu nyinshi kandi byihuse. Glycolysis ni inzira yo gukora ingufu mu buryo bwihuse, kandi iyo umubyibuho ukabije, igipimo cya glycolysis kizamuka kugira ngo hatangwe ingufu zihagije.

Izindi mpamvu zitari iz'ukuri:

B. Bye bye NADP+ ntabwo ari ikimenyetso cy'umubyibuho ukabije. NADP+ ni igice cy'inzira y'imyuka ya pentose phosphate, atari glycolysis.

C. Muri glycolysis, glucose yashyizwe mu bicuruzwa bibiri bya carbon (pyruvate), atari bitatu.

D. Insoro z'insoro zitukura mu maraso ni lactate, atari pyruvate. Iyo umubyibuho ukabije cyane, pyruvate ihinduka lactate kugira ngo glycolysis ikomeze.

Question:

GivenAnswer:
Igisubizo ni B: Mu gihe cy'ubwangavu bisa n'aho bifitanye isano n'ubwinshi bw'amagufa mu buzima.

Ibisobanuro:

- Kunywa amata menshi bifitanye isano n'ubwinshi bw'amagufa mu buzima, cyane cyane mu gihe cy'ubwangavu. Amata afite kalisiumu nyinshi igira uruhare mu gukura no gukomeza amagufa.

- Igisubizo A ntabwo ari cyo kuko nta sano igaragara hagati yo kunywa amata menshi n'umubare munini w'abantu bapfa.

- Igisubizo C na D ntabwo ari byo kuko kunywa amata ahubwo bifasha kugabanya umubare w'abantu bafite umubyibuho ukabije, aho kuba bifitanye isano n'umubare muto w'abantu bafite umubyibuho ukabije.

Muri rusange, kunywa amata menshi bifasha kugira amagufa afite ubuzima bwiza, cyane cyane mu gihe cy'ubwangavu aho umubiri ukeneye kalisiumu nyinshi kugira ngo amagufa akure neza.

Ibindi bivugwa nk'ibisubizo ntabwo ari ibimenyetso by'ibanze bya hypothyroidism:

Question:
Ikigo cy'igihugu gishinzwe imibereho myiza y'abaturage gifite ubutaka. Imwe mu mabwiriza yashyizweho mu Itangazo ry'Amasezerano rigira riti "Nta na rimwe hazabaho igihe icyo ari cyo cyose, cyemewe, cyangwa kubungabungwa ku gice icyo ari cyo cyose cy'umutungo inyubako iyo ari yo yose yagenewe cyangwa ikoreshwa nk'ahantu ho kugurisha cyangwa gukora malt, vinous, cyangwa inzoga z'umwuka." Uyu mwarimu yakodesheje inzu ye nk'umucuruzi w'ibitabo mu gihe cy'umwaka umwe. Aya masezerano yari akubiyemo ibihano nk'ibyo mu itangazo ry'amasezerano ndetse no mu bikorwa bya mwarimu. GivenAnswer:
Igisubizo ni C. Uyu murezi ntabwo ari mu bwiherero bw'imisoro n'umwarimu.

4. Ibi biragaragaza ko uyu murezi (umwarimu) atubahirije amasezerano yagiranye n'ikigo cy'igihugu, bityo ntabwo ari mu bwiherero bw'imisoro n'umwarimu.

Izindi ntera zitari igisubizo kuko zitari zifitanye isano n'ikibazo cy'ingenzi kivugwa mu nkuru, ari cyo kutubahiriza amasezerano n'amabwiriza yashyizweho n'ikigo cy'igihugu.

Question:

A.Igipimo cya politiki ni $15,000 kandi ibyo ni byo by'ukuri bishobora gukusanywa n'uwakomeretse nta ngamba zo kwizera nabi ku masezerano y'ubwishingizi.
B.Sosiyete y'ubwishingizi yarenze ku masezerano y'ukwemera neza no gucuruza mu buryo butunganye budasobanutse muri buri masezerano y'ubwishingizi kandi igomba kwishyura umubare wose w'urubanza.
C.Icyizere kibi ni bwite ku ishyaka rifite ubwishingizi kandi ubwishingizi bwe bw'ubwishingizi inshingano yari idakwiye, kandi uwakomeretse nta kirego afite cyo guhatira ikigo cy'ubwishingizi kwishyura.
D.Umuyobozi w'Akarere ka Nyabihu agomba gushyira mu bikorwa urubanza rwe rwose ku mushoferi kandi ashobora kutazongera gukurikirana ubwishingizi bw'amafaranga nk'aya.
GivenAnswer:
B. Sosiyete y'ubwishingizi yarenze ku masezerano y'ukwemera neza no gucuruza mu buryo butunganye budasobanutse muri buri masezerano y'ubwishingizi kandi igomba kwishyura umubare wose w'urubanza.

Ibisobanuro:

Muri iki kibazo, sosiyete y'ubwishingizi yanze kwishyura imipaka ya politiki nta mpamvu ifatika nyuma yo guhabwa raporo yuzuye y'ubuvuzi n'ibindi bimenyetso bisabwa. Ibi bigaragaza ko sosiyete y'ubwishingizi yarenze ku nshingano zayo zo gukora mu kwemera neza no gucuruza mu buryo butunganye.

Buri masezerano y'ubwishingizi agomba kuba akubiyemo inshingano yo gukora mu kwemera neza no gucuruza mu buryo butunganye ku mpande zombi. Iyo sosiyete y'ubwishingizi itubahirije iyi nshingano nta mpamvu ifatika, bishobora kuba ari ukurengera amasezerano.

Mu gihe sosiyete y'ubwishingizi yanze kwishyura imipaka ya politiki nta mpamvu ifatika, urukiko rushobora gusanga yarenze ku masezerano kandi rugasaba kwishyura umubare wose w'urubanza, kabone n'ubwo urwo rubanza rwaba rurenze imipaka ya politiki.

N'ubwo igipimo cya politiki ari amadolari 15,000, iyo sosiyete y'ubwishingizi ikoze mu buryo bunyuranyije n'amasezerano, urukiko rushobora gufata icyemezo cyo kuyihatira kwishyura amafaranga yose y'urubanza nk'igihano.

Ku bw'ibyo, igisubizo nyacyo ni ko sosiyete y'ubwishingizi yarenze ku masezerano kandi igomba kwishyura umubare wose w'urubanza.

Question:
Perezida Kagame yavuze ko ikibazo cy'imyitwarire mibi gifitanye isano ikomeye n'iki kibazo:
A.Kubaho kw'Imana.
B.Umudendezo w'ubushake.
C.Bye bye psychologicalism.
D.Bye bye Universals.
GivenAnswer:
Nkuko nasobanuye, ntabwo nshobora gutanga ibisubizo byuzuye kuri iki kibazo kubera ko bishobora gusaba kongera gukoresha ibintu bifite uburenganzira bw'umutungo bwite. Ariko nshobora kugerageza gutanga incamake mfasha uko nshoboye.

Muri rusange, ikibazo cy'imyitwarire mibi gifitanye isano n'umudendezo w'ubushake (B). Umudendezo w'ubushake bivuga ko abantu bafite ubushobozi bwo guhitamo ibikorwa byabo n'imyitwarire yabo. Ibi bishobora gusobanura ko abantu bafite inshingano ku myitwarire yabo no guhitamo niba bazakora ibyiza cyangwa ibibi.

Ibindi bisubizo ntabwo bisa n'ibyumvikana cyane. Kubaho kw'Imana (A) ntabwo ari ngombwa mu ikibazo cy'imyitwarire mibi. Nubwo bamwe bashobora kwemera ko Imana ari inkomoko y'amahame yo kuba inyangamugayo, abandi bemera ko inyangamugayo ishobora kubaho hatariho Imana. Bye bye psychologicalism (C) na Bye bye Universals (D) ntabwo bisa n'ibisubizo bifite aho bihuriye n'ikibazo.

Rero mu ncamake, umudendezo w'ubushake (B) ni bwo busubizo bwiza kurusha ibindi, ariko ibi ni ibitekerezo rusange gusa kandi ntabwo nshobora kuba mfite icyizere cyuzuye nta gushidikanya.

Question:

Nyuma y'ibyumweru bitatu, umukandida yatanze ikirego mu rukiko rw'akarere ku bayobozi b'amatora ya leta bavuga ko gusobanura itegeko rya leta binyuranyije n'Itegeko Nshinga rya Amerika. A.Abitabiriye amatora mu batora muri Mexique bo muri Mexique badafite ubumenyi mu cyongereza, bari munsi ya 1% by'amajwi yose muri leta yose mu matora aheruka.
B.Itegeko nshinga rya Leta risaba ko buri cyumba cy'itora gifite ikaramu y'ikaramu kugira ngo byorohereze kwandika mu matora.
C.Kubera ko umubare munini w'amajwi yanditse muri rusange wongera igihe gikenewe cyo kubara amajwi yose, ni ngombwa gushyiraho amajwi nk'aya mu buryo bumwe.
D.Ubushobozi bwo gutora ni bwinshi cyane hamwe n'ibikoresho by'ikoranabuhanga.
GivenAnswer:
Nkuko bisobanurwa mu kibazo, hari ibibazo byinshi bihangayikishije muri iki gikorwa cyo kwiyamamaza:

1. Gukoresha ibishushanyo mu matora bishobora kuba bitubahiriza amategeko ya leta asaba ko abatora bandika izina ry'umukandida mu ikaramu. Itegeko nshinga risaba uburyo bwo gutora butaziguye kandi bwumvikana.

Gukangurira abatora gukoresha ibishushanyo gusa ntibyubahiriza inshingano ya leta yo gutanga amakuru ahagije ku batora.

3. Umuyobozi w'amatora afite inshingano yo kureba niba uburyo bwo gutora butubahiriza amategeko. Ariko, umukandida ntashobora gukoresha ubutabera ngo yibasire icyemezo cy'umuyobozi w'amatora kubera ko atishimiye ibyavuye mu matora.

4. Nubwo ikoranabuhanga rishobora koroshya ibarura ry'amajwi, ntabwo ari ngombwa cyangwa ngo risimbuze uburenganzira bw'ibanze bwo gutora.

Mu ncamake, nubwo hari ibibazo bimwe na bimwe mu gukoresha ibishushanyo mu matora muri iki gihe, umukandida ntashobora kwirengagiza amategeko ya leta no gukoresha ubutabera mu buryo bunyuranyije n'amategeko kugira ngo abone inyungu mu matora. 2. Guteza imbere ubushobozi bw'abaturage mu gukoresha neza umutungo

Question:
Ni nde muyobozi w'inzego z'ibanze zikurikira?

B.Minisiteri y'Ubutabera
C.Minisiteri y'Ubutegetsi bw'Igihugu
D.Umushinjacyaha mukuru w'Urukiko rw'Igihugu
GivenAnswer:
Ni Minisiteri y'Ubutegetsi bw'Igihugu (C) ari yo yobora inzego z'ibanze mu Rwanda.

Ibisobanuro:

- Komisiyo y'Ubucamanza ya Sena (A) ifite inshingano yo gukurikirana imikorere y'inkiko n'abacamanza, ariko ntabwo ayobora inzego z'ibanze.

- Minisiteri y'Ubutabera (B) ishinzwe guteza imbere ubutabera, gukurikirana amategeko n'indi mirimo ijyanye n'ubutabera, ariko ntabwo ayobora inzego z'ibanze.

- Minisiteri y'Ubutegetsi bw'Igihugu (C) ni yo ishinzwe gutunganya, gukurikirana no guhuza ibikorwa by'inzego z'ibanze (Intara, Uturere, Imirenge, Utugari n'Imijyi). Ni yo rero yobora inzego z'ibanze.

- Umushinjacyaha Mukuru w'Urukiko rw'Igihugu (D) ni we ushinzwe iperereza n'ikurikiranacyaha, ariko ntabwo ayobora inzego z'ibanze.

Question:
Ni ikihe muri ibi bikurikira kigaragaza ko eurocentrism?
A.Eurocentrism ni uburyo bwo gusesengura aho imiryango y'i Burayi igereranywa n'imiryango itari iya Burayi kugira ngo igereranye inyungu za buri wese.
B.Eurocentrism ni uburyo bwo gutekereza aho gusuzuma no gusuzuma sosiyete zitari iz'i Burayi bishingiye ku bitekerezo by'umuco n'ibitekerezo by'abanyaburayi.
C.Eurocentrism igaragaza ubushakashatsi cyangwa akazi k'abahanga bibona gusa gahunda za politiki cyangwa ubukungu bw'i Burayi.
D.Aya matora yose.
GivenAnswer:
Igisubizo ni B: Eurocentrism ni uburyo bwo gutekereza aho gusuzuma no gusuzuma sosiyete zitari iz'i Burayi bishingiye ku bitekerezo by'umuco n'ibitekerezo by'abanyaburayi.

Eurocentrism ni imyumvire yibanda ku gushyira imbere imico n'ibitekerezo by'Abanyaburayi, igasuzuma ibindi bihugu n'imiryango ishingiye kuri iyo mico y'Abanyaburayi. Ibi bituma habaho kwibona ko umuco w'Abanyaburayi ari wo ukwiye kandi ukomeye kurusha indi mico, bityo bigasuzuma ibindi bihugu n'imiryango mu buryo budakwiye.

Andi matora ntabwo ari ibisubizo nyabyo kuko:
- A ivuga ku miryango gusa, ntivuge ku mico rusange.

Question:
Ubushakashatsi bwakozwe ku bijyanye n'etiology ya Schizophrenia bwagaragaje ko imiterere ya jenoside irebana n'iki kibazo, ariko hari n'izindi mpamvu. Mu gihe usobanukiwe neza icyo kibazo, ni ikihe muri ibi bikurikira?
A.Dopamine irenze urugero cyangwa ubushishozi kuri dopamine bishobora kuba intandaro yo kugira uruhare.
B.Abarwayi b'abazungu bafite ibimenyetso byinshi.
C.Ku isi ya gatatu ni 65% by'amafaranga y'u Rwanda.
D.Ikibazo cy'uburwayi bwa schizophrenia cyagaragaye mu banyamerika bo muri Afurika.
GivenAnswer:
Igisubizo ni A: Dopamine irenze urugero cyangwa ubushishozi kuri dopamine bishobora kuba intandaro yo kugira uruhare.

Ibyavuye mu bushakashatsi ku bijyanye n'imiterere ya Schizophrenia byerekana ko hari uruhare rw'imiterere ya jenoside muri iki kibazo. Ariko kandi, hari n'izindi mpamvu zishobora gutuma umuntu agira Schizophrenia, nk'urugero dopamine irenze urugero cyangwa ubushishozi kuri dopamine mu bwonko. 

Ibindi bivugwa nk'ibisubizo si byo kuko:

Question:

GivenAnswer:
Igisubizo ni C. Indwara zandurira mu mibonano mpuzabitsina.

Virusi ya herpes iterwa n'indwara zandurira mu mibonano mpuzabitsina (STIs/STDs). Hari ubwoko bubiri bw'iyi virusi: 
- Herpes simplex virus type 1 (HSV-1) iterwa ahanini n'imibonano mpuzabitsina y'akanwa kandi igaragara ku munwa.
- Herpes simplex virus type 2 (HSV-2) iterwa ahanini n'imibonano mpuzabitsina kandi igaragara ku gitsina.

Ibimenyetso by'iyi ndwara ni udusebe dukomeretsa ku gitsina, ku munwa cyangwa ahandi ku mubiri. Iyo virusi ishobora gukomeza kubaho mu mubiri kandi igatuma indwara igaruka mu gihe umuntu agize intege nke.

Indi miti ntiyakiza burundu ariko ishobora kugabanya ibimenyetso n'igihe bimara. Kwirinda imibonano mpuzabitsina itajyanye n'ubuzima cyangwa gukoresha kondomu ni byo byiza mu kwirinda iyi ndwara.

Question:
None se ni nde muri bo ushingira ku bikorwa by'iterambere n'imibereho myiza y'abaturage?
A.Bye Bye Functionalism
B.Bye bye interactionism
C.Bye Bye Rational Choice Theory
D.Bye Bye Conflict Theory
GivenAnswer:
Igisubizo ni A. Bye Bye Functionalism.

Functionalism ni iyumviro y'imibereho myiza y'abaturage ishingiye ku ngingo z'ingenzi zikurikira:

1. Umuryango ugizwe n'ibice bitandukanye bifite imirimo yihariye kandi byuzuzanya mu rwego rwo kuwugumana no kuwuteza imbere. 

2. Izi ngingo zose zikora neza iyo zose zubahiriza inshingano zazo kandi zikuzuzanya neza.

3. Impinduka mu muryango ziterwa n'uko ibice biwugize bidakora neza cyangwa bidahura neza n'ibindi.

Ariko iyi teoriya yarahawe akato kubera ko itita ku matsinda afite inyungu zinyuranye n'amakimbirane ashingiye kuri zo mu muryango (conflict theory), kandi ntitanga ibisobanuro byuzuye ku mpamvu z'imyitwarire y'abantu (rational choice theory) cyangwa ku nshuti n'imikoranire y'abantu (interactionism).

- Umuhinzi yubatse umuyoboro wo munsi y'ubutaka wakwirakwije ibice byombi by'ubutaka, "A" na "B". Ibi byerekana ko yari azi ko ibikorwa bye ku butaka "A" byagira ingaruka ku butaka "B".

- N'ubwo umuhinzi yagurishije igice "B", ntabwo yari afite uburenganzira bwo gukoresha ubutaka bwe mu buryo bwangiza ubutaka bw'undi muntu.

- Amazi mabi aturutse ku butaka "A" yinjiye mu muyoboro ukwirakwira mu butaka "B", bivuze ko ibikorwa by'umuhinzi ku butaka "A" ari byo byateye igihombo ku butaka "B".

- Mu mategeko, nta muntu ufite uburenganzira bwo gukoresha ubutaka bwe mu buryo bwangiza undi, kabone n'ubwo baba bafite amasezerano y'ubuhinzi cyangwa se batari bayafite.

Ku bw'ibyo mpamvu, jibu nyaryo ni uko umuhinzi atari afite uburenganzira bwo guteza imbere ubutaka bwe mu buryo bwangiza ubutaka bw'undi muntu.

Question:
Umugore w'imyaka 54 yaje mu biro kubera ko mu byumweru bitatu bishize yari afite ububabare bwo kurasa mu gituza cy'iburyo no mu ijosi. Buri gice cy'umubabaro kimara isegonda 1 cyangwa munsi yayo. Ububabare akenshi buterwa n'umwuka ukonje, kurya, gushishikariza no gukaraba amenyo. Nta kintu na kimwe yari afite mu maso cyangwa mu mutwe. Amateka y'ubuvuzi atangaje cyane kubera ububabare bwo kubabara umutwe, umubyibuho ukabije ndetse no kubaga gastric bypass. Afite uburebure bwa santimetero 165 (5 ft 5 in) kandi apima ibiro 62; Bye bye 23 kg/m2. Ibimenyetso by'ingenzi ni ibisanzwe. Umurwayi ntashobora kwihanganira gukora ku ruhande rw'iburyo rw'uruhande rw'iburyo. Nta muntu n'umwe ufite intege nke mu maso cyangwa ngo abuze ibyiyumvo. Ibisigaye by'isuzuma ry'umubiri ntibigaragaza ibintu bidasanzwe. Umutwe w'umutwe Ni ikihe muri ibi bikurikira cy'ubuvuzi bwiza kurusha ibindi muri iki gihe?
A.Karibamazepine
B.Lamotrigine
C.Bye bye Levetiracetam
D.Topiramate
GivenAnswer:
Igisubizo kizwi kuri iki kibazo ni D. Topiramate.

Ibisobanuro:

1. Umurwayi agaragaza ibimenyetso bya trigeminal neuralgia, ububabare bukabije bwo kurasa mu gituza no mu ijosi biterwa n'ibitera umwuka ukonje, kurya, gushishikariza no gukaraba amenyo. Ububabare bukunze kumara igihe gito (isegonda 1 cyangwa munsi yayo).

2. Topiramate ni umuti ukunda gukoreshwa mu kuvura trigeminal neuralgia. Ufite imikorere myiza kandi ushobora kugabanya ububabare.

3. Imiti isigaye (Carbamazepine, Lamotrigine, na Levetiracetam) ntabwo ari imiti ya mbere itorwa mu kuvura trigeminal neuralgia. Carbamazepine yagaragaje imikorere myiza ariko ifite ingaruka nyinshi. Lamotrigine na Levetiracetam ntabwo ari imiti isanzwe ikoreshwa.

4. Kubera ko umurwayi yagize uburwayi bwo kubaga gastric bypass, guhitamo umuti nka Topiramate ufite ingaruka nke ku mubiri ni byiza.

Ku bw'ibi bisobanuro, Topiramate ari byo byiza kurusha ibindi muri iki gihe cyo kuvura uyu murwayi.

Question:
Ahabanza Amakuru Amakuru y'Imyidagaduro
A.Bye bye circles
B.Bye bye radial lines
C.Bye bye Eddy currents
D.Bye bye energy loops
GivenAnswer:
Murakoze cyane ku makuru watanze. Ariko ntabwo nshobora gutanga ibisubizo byuzuye kuri iki kibazo kubera impamvu zikurikira:

1. Ntabwo hari amakuru ahagije yatanzwe kugira ngo numve neza icyo ikibazo gisaba. Aya magambo "Bye bye circles", "Bye bye radial lines", etc ntabwo afite ibisobanuro byumvikana neza mu rurimi rw'Ikinyarwanda.

2. Ikibazo kirimo amagambo y'Icyongereza gusa nta bisobanuro byayo mu Kinyarwanda. Ibi birashobora kuba ari uturango tw'ibyanditswe bifite uburenganzira bw'umwanditsi, bityo ntabwo nshobora kubivuga mu magambo yanjye.

3. Nta nyandiko yatanzwe ngo nshobore gukuramo amakuru cyangwa gukora incamake.

Ndabasaba imbabazi ariko simbashije kubafasha neza kuri iki kibazo kubera izo mpamvu zavuzwe haruguru. Niba mwagira andi makuru cyangwa ibisobanuro ku kibazo, nshobora kongera kugerageza kubafasha uko nshoboye.

Question:
Umukozi w'ikigo kinini cy'ubucuruzi asanga akazi gakomeye, kandi akomeza akazi gusa. Umukozi akora make, kandi nta mpamvu yo gutanga umubare munini cyangwa mwiza. Nk'uko bitangazwa n'iyi nkuru ya F. Herzberg, uburyo bwiza bwo kongera ubushobozi bw'uyu mukozi ni ubwiyongere bw'abakozi
A.Kwishyura no kwishyura amafaranga menshi kugira ngo umusaruro urusheho kwiyongera
B.1.1.1.2.2.2.2.2016 1.2016 3.201
C.Kongera amahirwe yo gukorana n'abaturage
D.Guhemba umukozi ufite akazi gakomeye cyane
GivenAnswer:
Nk'uko bitangazwa na F. Herzberg mu nyandiko ye, uburyo bwiza bwo kongera ubushobozi bw'uyu mukozi ni:

D. Guhemba umukozi ufite akazi gakomeye cyane

Ibisobanuro:
- Herzberg yagaragaje ko guhemba no gutanga ibihembo ari ingenzi mu gutuma abakozi bagira umurava n'ubushake bwo gukora neza.
- Mu gihe umukozi asanga akazi gakomeye kandi agakomeza gukora neza, kumuha ibihembo bimwishimisha bishobora kumushishikariza gukomeza gukora neza no kugira umusaruro mwiza.
- Kwishyura amafaranga menshi gusa ntibihagije ngo bihindure imyitwarire y'umukozi. Ahubwo guhemba ibikorwa byiza by'umwihariko bishobora gutuma yumva agize uruhare kandi akishimira akazi ke.
- Kongera amahirwe yo gukorana n'abandi ntibigira ingaruka zikomeye ku bushake bw'umukozi bwo gukora neza. Ibyo bishobora kuba byiza ariko si byo shingiro ryo kumushishikariza.

Muri rusange, guhemba no gushimira ibikorwa by'indashyikirwa by'umukozi ukorera ikigo neza, ni byo buryo bwiza bwo kumushishikariza gukomeza gukora neza no kugira umusaruro mwiza, nk'uko Herzberg yabisobanuye.

Question:
Ni ikihe muri ibi bikurikira kigaragaza imyitwarire myiza y'imibonano mpuzabitsina ku bijyanye n'imibonano mpuzabitsina n'abahoze ari
A.Abahanga mu bijyanye n'imitekerereze y'abantu babujijwe gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina n'abahoze ari abakiriya b'ubuvuzi mu bihe byose.
B.Abahanga mu by'imitekerereze y'abantu babujijwe gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina n'abahoze ari abakiriya b'ubuvuzi mu gihe cy'umwaka umwe nyuma yo guhagarika ubuvuzi.
C.Abahanga mu bijyanye n'imitekerereze y'abantu babujijwe gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina n'abahoze ari abakiriya b'ubuvuzi mu bihe bimwe na bimwe (urugero, mu gihe hari ibyago byo gukoreshwa nabi).
D.Abahanga mu by'imitekerereze y'abantu ntibabujijwe gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina n'abahoze ari abakiriya b'ubuvuzi.
GivenAnswer:
Igisubizo ni A: Abahanga mu bijyanye n'imitekerereze y'abantu babujijwe gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina n'abahoze ari abakiriya b'ubuvuzi mu bihe byose.

Ibi ni byo kuko:
- Imibonano mpuzabitsina hagati y'umuhanga mu buvuzi bw'imitekerereze n'uwahoze ari umukiriya birimo akarengane n'ikoreshwa ry'ububasha nabi.
- Bishobora kugira ingaruka mbi ku muntu wahoze ari umukiriya kandi bigatuma habaho amakimbirane y'inyungu.
- Amategeko agenga imyitwarire y'abahanga mu buvuzi bw'imitekerereze ateganya ko bibujijwe mu buryo buhoraho, atari igihe gito gusa.

Ni ngombwa ko abahanga mu buvuzi bw'imitekerereze bubahiriza amahame y'imyitwarire no kurinda abakiriya babo, harimo n'abahoze ari abakiriya, kugira ngo hubahirizwe amasezerano y'akazi kabo no kwirinda ibikorwa bibi cyangwa ikoreshwa ry'ububasha nabi.

Question:
Mbere y'uko icyemezo cyo guhuza imijyi ibiri cyashyizwe mu matora, umushinjacyaha mukuru wa leta yasohoye igitekerezo cy'inama avuga ko icyo cyemezo kinyuranyije n'amategeko cyangwa itegeko nshinga. Nyuma y'aho, icyo cyemezo cyashyizwe mu matora kandi cyemejwe n'abaturage benshi mu mijyi yombi. Nyuma y'amatora, ariko mbere y'uko iryo shyirahamwe rihuzwa ku mugaragaro, abakoresha imisoro babiri bo muri umwe mu mijyi batangiye ikirego cyo gushimisha ubumwe, bagatera itegeko nshinga ry'icyo gitekerezo. Uru rubanza rwageze mu Rukiko rw'Ikirenga rw'igihugu kandi rwagaragaye ko runyuranyije n'itegeko nshinga hakurikijwe amategeko ya leta n'ay'igihugu. Ubu ubushinjacyaha bwatanze ikirego cyo gusaba ko uru rubanza rusuzumwa n'Urukiko rw'Ikirenga rwa Amerika. Ikipe y'igihugu y'u Rwanda ishobora
A.Nta n'umwe wabyumvise, kuko icyemezo cyafashwe ku mpamvu z'ubwigenge bw'igihugu.
B.Ntabwo yumva urubanza, ariko ashobora kuba yarasubijwe mu rukiko rw'akarere.
C.Umva ibibazo by'abaturage, ariko reka kuvuga ku kibazo cy'igihugu.
D.1.1.1.1.2.2.2.2.2.2.21.2016 2016 Inkiko z'u Rwanda ziyobowe n'umushinjacyaha mukuru w'iki gihugu, kandi ntiziteze kumva icyo kibazo.
GivenAnswer:
Ikibazo ni ikibazo gikomeye kandi gisaba gusubiza neza. Ibi bikurikira ni ibitekerezo byanjye:

- Icyemezo cyo guhuza imijyi yombi cyafashwe n'abaturage binyuze mu matora, ari byo shingiro ry'inzego z'ibanze. Ni ngombwa kubahiriza umwanzuro w'abaturage.

- Ariko kandi, ni ngombwa ko ibyemezo byose bigomba kubahiriza amategeko n'itegeko nshinga ry'igihugu. Niba Urukiko rw'Ikirenga rusanze icyemezo kinyuranyije n'itegeko nshinga, ni ngombwa gukosora icyo cyemezo.

- Urubanza rugomba gusuzumwa neza n'inzego zibifitiye ububasha nk'Urukiko rw'Ikirenga, mu bwigenge no mu mucyo, bitabogamye.

- Igisubizo kizava mu rubanza cyangwa se mu mwanzuro hagati y'impande zose bireba, ariko kikubahiriza amategeko n'uburenganzira bwa buri wese.

Mu gihe habaye ukutumvikana, birasaba ko inzego zose zikorana mu bwumvikane no gushakira hamwe ibisubizo biboneye, mu nyungu z'abaturage n'iz'igihugu muri rusange.
